name: Return of the Pretzels
description: The pretzel vs human war has raged on for 100 years. The pretzels are outraged after the pretzel king Big Soft Twist III was captured and sent to the bakery. You are a medieval king fighting pretzels. To defend yourself, you send your various kinds of kids into battle. This is very sad because they are your kids and they are being sacrificed! Oh no!
